about_the_game:
Battlefield Commander WWII is a game that combines strategy and tactics with historically accurate units.

Years and Theaters

The game contains units from the Soviet Union and Germany spanning the late war period (1944-45). Units from the early war ('39-'41) and mid-war ('42-'43) will also be introduced. Other nations, including the US, UK, and Japan, will be added in the future. The European, African, and Pacific theaters of war will all be included.

Game Modes

The game is playable in single-player and online PvP skirmish will be coming in the future, with three different battle types to choose from:

  • Battle - Gain victory points by destroying enemy units.

  • Capture - Gain victory by controlling the most strategic areas on the map at the end of the battle.

  • Assault - Attacker attempts to capture the defender's strategic area.

The game will also feature a dynamic campaign mode for all nations in the future.

Gameplay

Experience realistic combat with limited ammo, morale, energy, LOS, and shot accuracy. Infantry can be suppressed, panic, and rout if morale drops too far. Vehicles have accurate armor, movement, and penetration values.

Start each battle with requisition points, which you will use strategically throughout the fight to pull in new reinforcements and counter your enemy. Order your troops to charge head-first into the enemy or sneak and outflank your opponent for an ambush! Overwhelm the enemy with heavy infantry or overrun them with unstoppable armor. Use snipers and recon units to scout the enemy and discover their intentions. Control units like the quick and agile "Puma," the terror-inducing "Katyusha," the iconic T-34, and the monster Tiger II. Command the battlefield and lead your army to victory!

Features

  • Destructible buildings

  • Dynamic weather

  • Seasonal maps

  • Line-of-sight tool

  • 86 different units (with more coming!)

  • Realistic vehicle armor and penetration

  • Realistic infantry behavior

  • Single player skirmish vs AI

  • Single player dynamic campaign (coming soon)

  • Multiplayer PvP skirmish (coming soon)

content_descriptors.notes: Historical WWII combat. No body mutilation, blood, or use of gore.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel i5 or equivalent
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GTX 1050 or equivalent
  • Storage: 10 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10+
  • Processor: Intel i7 or equivalent
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: RTX 2060 or equivalent
  • Storage: 10 GB available space

short_description: Battlefield Commander WWII is a real-time tactical game where you lead the soldiers and vehicles that battled across the globe during this time in history. Play hundreds of unique units across multiple game modes.
